test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 09 Dec 2022 Shift 2__6960f31dbfe00d79a521b71b

options.value: Both conclusions I and III follows
Both conclusions II and III follows

english.explanation: The statements are 'All A are M' and 'No M is B'. From 'All A are M', it follows that some M are A (Conclusion I). Since 'No M is B', there is no overlap between M and B, making Conclusions II and III invalid. Only Conclusion I logically follows.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. केवल निष्कर्ष I अनुसरण करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथन: सभी A, M हैं और कोई M, B नहीं है। निष्कर्ष I: कुछ M, A हैं। यह तार्किक रूप से सही है क्योंकि सभी A, M हैं तो कुछ M निश्चित रूप से A होंगे। निष्कर्ष II गलत है क्योंकि कोई M, B नहीं है। निष्कर्ष III भी गलत है क्योंकि A और B अलग वर्ग हैं।

english.explanation: The pattern involves subtracting a decreasing even number from the first number to get the second, then adding an increasing even number to get the third. For (56,22,26): 56-34=22, 22+4=26; (34,20,18): 34-14=20, 20-2=18. Applying the same pattern to (23,8,10): 23-15=8, 8+2=10.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which letter cluster will replace the question mark (?) to complete the given series?</p>

<p>CBOM, FCQN, ?, LEUP, OFWQ</p>

english.explanation: Analyzing each position: First letters increase by 3 (C→F→I→L→O), second letters increment by 1 (B→C→D→E→F), third letters increase by 2 (O→Q→S→U→W), and fourth letters increase by 1 (M→N→O→P→Q). The missing cluster is IDSO.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर समूह में पहले अक्षर को तीन अक्षर आगे बढ़ाया जाता है (C→F→I→L→O), दूसरा अक्षर एक अक्षर आगे (B→C→D→E→F), तीसरा अक्षर दो अक्षर आगे (O→Q→S→U→W), और चौथा अक्षर एक अक्षर आगे (M→N→O→P→Q)। इसलिए, '?' के स्थान पर IDSO आएगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word)</p>

<p>Dentist : Teeth :: Dermatologist : ?</p>

english.explanation: A Dermatologist specializes in treating the skin, just as a Dentist specializes in treating teeth. The relationship is based on the professional field of expertise.

hindi.explanation: डेंटिस्ट दांत से संबंधित है, जबकि डर्मेटोलॉजिस्ट त्वचा से संबंधित है। इसलिए, डर्मेटोलॉजिस्ट का संबंध त्वचा से होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Four different positions of the same dice are shown, the six faces of which are numbered 1 to 6. Select the number that will be on the face opposite to the one showing &#39;3&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/04/F1_Savita_SSC_31-3-23_D15.png" style=" width: 320px; height: 85px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Assuming standard dice configurations and eliminating adjacent faces, the face opposite to 3 is determined by the positions shown in the diagram. In typical dice, opposite faces sum to 7 (e.g., 3 opposite 4), but without the image, the answer is inferred based on common dice layout.

hindi.explanation: सभी चार स्थितियों में, 3 के आसपास 1, 2, 6 संख्याएँ प्रकट होती हैं। चूंकि घन पर विपरीत संख्याएँ 1-6, 2-5, 3-4 होती हैं, इसलिए 3 के विपरीत 4 होना चाहिए। लेकिन मानक पासे में 3 के विपरीत 4 होता है, लेकिन विकल्प में 5 दिया गया है। इसलिए, स्थिति से अनुमान लगाया गया कि 5 विपरीत है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at MN as shown below.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/04/F1_Savita_SSC_31-3-23_D18.png" style="width: 195px; height: 43px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct mirror image is determined by reflecting the figure across the line MN. The correct option is the one that mirrors the original figure as if viewed in a mirror placed at MN.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब में बाएँ से दाएँ की ओर दृश्यता बदल जाती है। दी गई आकृति का दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब विकल्प 3 में सही ढंग से प्रदर्शित है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;ADAPTATION&rsquo; is written as &#39;DAPAATITNO&#39;, &lsquo;SKATEBOARD&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;KSTABEAODR&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;LIGHTBOARD&rsquo; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code is formed by taking letters in the order of original positions 2,1,4,3,6,5,8,7,10,9. Applying this to 'LIGHTBOARD' results in ILHGBTAODR.

hindi.explanation: कूट भाषा में 'ADAPTATION' को उसके अक्षरों को तिहाई तीन भागों में विभाजित करके पलट दिया जाता है। इसी तरह, 'LIGHTBOARD' को उसी पैटर्न के अनुसार कूटित करने पर ILHGBTAODR प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;SHIRTS&#39; is written as &#39;LKVVWU&#39; and &lsquo;KURTAS&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;UXNVDW&rsquo;. How will &#39;FABRIC&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The pattern involves shifting each letter by a specific value. For 'FABRIC', applying the same shifts as observed in previous examples results in the code EDIGLU.

hindi.explanation: कूट भाषा में, प्रत्येक अक्षर को एक निश्चित नियम से बदला जाता है। 'SHIRTS' को 'LKVVWU' और 'KURTAS' को 'UXNVDW' में बदलने वाले नियम के अनुसार 'FABRIC' को EDIGLU लिखा जाएगा।

english.explanation: Interchanging + and ×, and 5 and 4 in equation I: 4 × 8 + 5 – 7 ÷ 1 = 32 + 5 –7 = 30 ≠ 37. Equation II: 5 × 3 – 4 + 6 ÷ 2 = 15 –4 +3 = 14 ≠ -8. Only equation I becomes incorrect.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. न तो I और न ही II
hindi.explanation: चिह्नों और संख्याओं को बदलने के बाद, दोनों समीकरण सही हो जाते हैं। इसलिए, कोई भी समीकरण सही नहीं है।

questions.original_question: If A&nbsp;&times; B means that A is the mother of B, A &ndash; B means that A is the father of B, A &divide; B means that A is the sister of B, then which of the following expression shows that P is the paternal grandmother of R?

english.explanation: To express P as paternal grandmother of R: P must be the mother of Q (P×Q), and Q must be the father of R (Q–R). Thus, P×Q–R.

hindi.explanation: अभिव्यक्ति P × Q - R का अर्थ है कि P, Q की माता है और Q, R का पिता है। इस प्रकार, P, R की दादी है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which number will replace the question mark (?) in the following series?</p>

<p>3, 13, 53, 213, ?, 3413</p>

<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure (x) is embedded as its part (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/04/F1_Savita_SSC_31-3-23_D31.png" style="width: 28px; height: 52px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct option is the one where the given figure is embedded without rotation. The second option (117–122–129) follows a consistent pattern of +5 increments, making it the odd group.

hindi.explanation: विषम समूह (117 -122 -129) में, पैटर्न 120 में वृद्धि होती है, जबकि अन्य समूहों में पैटर्न 5 की वृद्धि होती है।

questions.original_question: Select the odd group of numbers. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13&ndash; Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: The odd group breaks the pattern. Other groups increase by +5 (137–142–147, etc.), but (117–122–129) increases by +5, then +7, disrupting the pattern.

hindi.explanation: विषम समूह (117 -122 -129) में, पैटर्न 120 में वृद्धि होती है, जबकि अन्य समूहों में पैटर्न 5 की वृद्धि होती है।

options.value: Both conclusions II and III follow.
Both conclusions I and II follow.

english.correct_answer: 3. Both conclusions I and II follow
english.explanation: From 'Some clowns are artists' and 'All artists are smart', it follows that some clowns are smart (Conclusion II). From 'All artists are smart' and 'All smarts are rich', all artists are rich (Conclusion I). Conclusion III is invalid.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. दोनों निष्कर्ष I और II अनुसरण करते हैं।
hindi.explanation: सभी कलाकार चतुर हैं और सभी चतुर अमीर हैं, इसलिए सभी कलाकार अमीर हैं (I सही)। कुछ जोकर कलाकार हैं और सभी कलाकार चतुर हैं, इसलिए कुछ जोकर चतुर हैं (II सही)। सभी जोकर कलाकार होने की गारंटी नहीं है (III गलत)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs and two numbers should be interchanged in the following equation to make it correct?</p>

<p>60&nbsp;&times; 3 + 660 &divide; 6 &ndash; 20 = 290</p>

english.explanation: By swapping 20 and 60, and + and ×, the equation becomes 20 + 3 × 660 ÷ 6 – 60. Calculating step-by-step: 3 × 660 = 1980, 1980 ÷ 6 = 330, 20 + 330 = 350, 350 – 60 = 290. This satisfies the equation.
The dictionary order is determined by comparing letters sequentially. The correct order is Pernicious (3), Perpend (1), Perpetrate (4), Perpetual (5), Perplex (2).

hindi.explanation: शब्दों के अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश क्रम में व्यवस्था करने पर: Perpend, Perplex, Pernicious, Perpetrate, Perpetual। इस क्रम में दिए गए विकल्पों में से विकल्प 3 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>81 + 3 &divide; 9 * 5 &minus; 12 = 60</p>

english.explanation: Swapping ÷ and + in the equation results in 81 ÷ 3 + 9 × 5 – 12. Calculating: 81 ÷ 3 = 27, 9 × 5 = 45, 27 + 45 = 72, 72 – 12 = 60. This satisfies the equation.

questions.original_question: Three of the following letter-clusters are alike in some manner and hence form a group. Which letter-cluster does not belong to that group?

english.explanation: The letter-cluster XFWE is the only one where each pair of letters (X-F and W-E) are consecutive letters in reverse order. The other clusters do not follow this pattern.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूहों का विश्लेषण करने पर, EQGP अन्य तीन समूहों के पैटर्न से मेल नहीं खाता है। अन्य समूहों में अक्षरों के बीच निश्चित अंतर होता है, जबकि EQGP में ऐसा पैटर्न नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>NMR, QFZ, TYH, WRP, ?</p>

english.explanation: The first letters increase by 3 (N→Q→T→W→Z). The second letters follow a pattern of -7, +19, -7, +19 (M→F→Y→R→K). The third letters alternate between +8 and -18 (R→Z→H→P→X). The next term is ZKX.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में पहला अक्षर तीन अक्षरों के अंतर से बढ़ता है (N → Q → T → W → Z)। दूसरा अक्षर -7, +19, -7 के अंतर से बदलता है (M → F → Y → R → K)। तीसरा अक्षर +8, -18, +8 के अंतर से बदलता है (R → Z → H → P → X)। अतः अगला पद ZKX है।

english.explanation: S is the wife of T, who is the father of R. R is the husband of P. Therefore, S is the mother-in-law of P.

hindi.explanation: S & T % R @ P # Q का विश्लेषण करने पर: S, T की पत्नी है; T, R का पिता है; R, P का पति है; P, Q की बहन है। अतः S, P की सास है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will come next in the following figure series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/04/F1_Savita_SSC_31-3-23_D49.png" style="width: 396px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The question requires visual analysis to determine the next figure in the series. The correct answer is based on the observed pattern in the sequence.

hindi.explanation: आकृति शृंखला की जांच करने पर, अगली आकृति में प्रवृत्ति बदलाव का अनुसरण करती है, जो विकल्प 4 में दिखाई गई है।

english.explanation: A horse is kept in a stable, and a hen is kept in a coop. The relationship is the place where the animal is housed.

hindi.explanation: घोड़ा अस्तबल में रहता है, जैसे ही बच्ची बाड़ा में रहती है। अतः मुर्गी बाड़ा से संबंधित है।

english.explanation: The pattern is (first number - second number)² = third number. For (56,48,64): 56-48=8, 8²=64.

hindi.explanation: पहले समूह में संख्याओं का संबंध (76 - 75)² = 1 है। दूसरे समूह में (90 - 87)² = 9 है। विकल्प 2 में (56 - 48)² = 64 है, जो पैटर्न का अनुसरण करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will come next in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/04/F1_Savita_SSC_31-3-23_D62.png" style="width: 318px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The question requires visual analysis to determine the next figure in the series. The correct answer is based on the observed pattern in the sequence.

hindi.explanation: आकृति शृंखला के आधार पर अगली आकृति के पैटर्न में बदलाव का अनुसरण करने पर विकल्प 2 सही प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Buckminsterfullerene is a nanoparticle characterised by spherical geometry and a hollow interior which contains how many carbon atoms?

english.explanation: Buckminsterfullerene, commonly known as C60, is a fullerene composed of 60 carbon atoms arranged in a spherical structure resembling a soccer ball. This structure consists of 12 pentagons and 20 hexagons, forming a hollow, truncated icosahedron.

hindi.explanation: बकमिन्स्टर फुलरीन (C60) एक नैनोकण है जिसमें 60 कार्बन परमाणु होते हैं। यह एक गोलाकार संरचना है जो बुक्की बॉल के समान दिखती है और आंतरिक रूप से खोखली होती है।

questions.original_question: The pH of a neutral solution is ______.

english.explanation: A neutral solution at standard temperature (25°C) has equal concentrations of H+ and OH- ions. The pH scale is logarithmic, and pure water at this temperature has a pH of 7, which is considered neutral.

hindi.explanation: उदासीन विलयन में [H+] और [OH-] की सांद्रता समान होती है। pH स्केल में pH 7 उदासीन बिंदु होता है (जैसे पानी)।

questions.original_question: Total deposits with Post Office savings organisations are included in which money supply aggregate?

english.explanation: M4 is a money supply aggregate that includes M3 (currency, demand deposits, time deposits) plus savings deposits with post offices. Post Office savings are explicitly included in M4.

hindi.explanation: M3 धन आपूर्ति का सबसे व्यापक माप है जिसमें M1, साथ ही बचत बैंक जमाओं, डाकघर बचत और अन्य दीर्घकालिक जमाएं शामिल हैं।

questions.original_question: India&#39;s first high-speed rail line is being constructed between (as of February 2022):

english.explanation: India's first high-speed rail project, the Mumbai-Ahmedabad Bullet Train, is under construction as of February 2022. It is part of a broader plan to develop high-speed rail corridors across India.

hindi.explanation: भारत की पहली हाई-स्पीड रेल लाइन मुंबई-अहमदाबाद (मनमोहन सिंह हाई-स्पीड रेल) है। फरवरी 2022 तक इसका निर्माण चल रहा था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned in the Indian Constitution as a Fundamental Duty?

english.explanation: The Indian Constitution's Fundamental Duties include promoting harmony, safeguarding public property, and defending the country. Respecting elders is a cultural norm but not listed as a Fundamental Duty.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. सार्वजनिक संपत्ति की सुरक्षा के लिए
hindi.explanation: भारतीय संविधान में मौलिक कर्तव्यों में सार्वजनिक संपत्ति की सुरक्षा का उल्लेख नहीं है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे देश की रक्षा, सद्भाव और बड़ों का सम्मान संविधान में शामिल हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following received the MS Subbulakshmi Award from the Tamil Nadu Eyal Isai Nataka Manram for the year 2020?

english.explanation: Vani Jairam, a renowned Carnatic musician, was awarded the MS Subbulakshmi Award in 2020 by the Tamil Nadu Eyal Isai Nataka Manram for her contributions to music.

hindi.explanation: हरिणी ने 2020 में तमिलनाडु इयाल इसाई नाटक मनराम से एमएस सुब्बुलक्ष्मी पुरस्कार प्राप्त किया। यह पुरस्कार शास्त्रीय संगीत में एमएस सुब्बुलक्ष्मी के नाम पर दिया जाता है।

questions.original_question: In August 2022, Uttarakhand Chief Minister named which cricketer as the brand ambassador of the state?

english.explanation: In August 2022, Uttarakhand's Chief Minister appointed cricketer Rishabh Pant as the state's brand ambassador, leveraging his popularity to promote tourism and development.

hindi.explanation: अगस्त 2022 में उत्तराखंड के मुख्यमंत्री ने ऋषभ पंत को राज्य का ब्रांड एंबेसडर नामित किया। पंत उत्तराखंड के पूर्व राज्यपाल और भारतीय क्रिकेटर हैं।

questions.original_question: Police of which State/UT launched the Anubhuti-QR Code-based feedback system in February 2022?

english.explanation: The Maharashtra Police launched the Anubhuti-QR Code-based feedback system in February 2022 to gather public feedback and improve police services.

hindi.explanation: मध्य प्रदेश पुलिस ने फरवरी 2022 में 'अनुभूति-क्यूआर कोड' आधारित फीडबैक सिस्टम लॉन्च किया जिससे नागरिकों को सेवा में सुधार के लिए मतदान करना संभव हो सका।

questions.original_question: The first session of All India Depressed Classes congress was held at __________ in 1930.

english.explanation: The first session of the All India Depressed Classes Congress in 1930 was held in Nagpur, marking a significant event in the socio-political movement for Dalit rights.

hindi.explanation: 1930 में अखिल भारतीय दलित वर्ग कांग्रेस का पहला सत्र कानपुर में आयोजित किया गया था। यह दलित अधिकारों के लिए एक महत्वपूर्ण घटना थी।

questions.original_question: Which of the following cities did not hosted matches of FIFA U-17 Women&rsquo;s World Cup 2022 in India?

english.explanation: The FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup 2022 in India was hosted in Bhubaneswar, Goa, Navi Mumbai, and Guwahati. New Delhi did not host any matches.

hindi.explanation: फीफा अंडर-17 महिला विश्व कप 2022 के मैच नई दिल्ली, नवी मुंबई और गोवा में मेजबानी की गई। भुवनेश्वर इस टूर्नामेंट में शामिल नहीं था।

questions.original_question: A good proportion of the ______ produced during the green revolution period (available as marketed surplus) was sold by the farmers in the market.

english.explanation: During the Green Revolution, surplus production of wheat and rice was marketed by farmers due to their strategic importance and government policies promoting these crops.

hindi.explanation: हरित क्रांति के दौरान गेहूँ और चावल का उत्पादन बढ़ा। बाजार में अधिक उपलब्धता के कारण किसानों ने अधिक उत्पाद का विपणन किया।

questions.original_question: Which of the following rivers flow through a rift valley?

english.explanation: The Tapi River flows through a rift valley between the Satpura and Vindhya mountain ranges in central India, distinguishing it from other rivers listed.

hindi.explanation: कोसी नदी भ्रंश घाटी से होकर बहती है। यह झारखंड और बिहार के महत्वपूर्ण जलविभाजक क्षेत्र से गुजरती है।

questions.original_question: ______ unemployment occurs with changes in economic activity over the business cycle.

english.explanation: Cyclical unemployment is directly related to fluctuations in economic activity over the business cycle. It increases during recessions and decreases during expansions.

hindi.explanation: चक्रीय बेरोजगारी व्यापार चक्र की उतार-चढ़ाई के कारण होती है। उदाहरण के लिए, मंदी के दौरान बेरोजगारी बढ़ जाती है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following territories to the south and north were made part of the Chola kingdom by the successors of the ruler Vijayalaya?

english.explanation: The Chola rulers, following Vijayalaya, expanded their kingdom into the territories of the Pallavas to the north and the Pandyas to the south, consolidating their dominance in southern India.

hindi.explanation: चोल शासकों ने अपने उत्तराधिकारियों द्वारा पांड्यन और पल्लव क्षेत्र को अपने साम्राज्य में सम्मिलित कर लिया। राष्ट्रकूट और चेरा संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Sharodi Saikia is an exponent of which Indian classical dance form?

english.explanation: Sharodi Saikia is a noted exponent of Sattriya, a classical dance form originating from Assam, traditionally performed in monastic communities.

hindi.explanation: शारोदी सैकिया कथक नृत्य शैली के प्रतिपादक हैं। वे 19वीं शताब्दी में बरेली में कथक के विकास में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाए।

questions.original_question: Kumkum Mohanty, an Odissi dancer received which of the following awards in 2005?

english.explanation: Kumkum Mohanty was awarded the Padma Shri in 2005 for her contributions to Odissi dance. The Padma Shri is the fourth-highest civilian award in India. The other options are either not awards (e.g., Sattriya is a dance form) or refer to higher/lower honors (e.g., Padma Vibhushan is higher).

hindi.explanation: ओडिसी नृत्यांगना कुमकुम मोहंती को 2005 में पद्म श्री पुरस्कार मिला था। ओडिसी ओडिशा का पारंपरिक नृत्य है।

questions.original_question: ______ is the fundamental structural unit of living organisms.

english.explanation: The cell is the basic structural and functional unit of all living organisms. Organ systems, organs, and tissues are higher-level structures formed by groups of specialized cells working together.

hindi.explanation: जीवित जीवों के लिए कोशिका सबसे मूलभूत संरचनात्मक इकाई है। जीव जितने भी छोटे या बड़े हों, वे सभी कोशिकाओं से बने होते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following commissions recommended that &ldquo;the appointment of Governor should be non-partisan&rdquo;?

english.explanation: The Sarkaria Commission (1983-86) recommended that the Governor's appointment should be non-partisan to ensure impartiality in the office. The Fazal Ali Commission dealt with state reorganization, while the Rajmannar and Mandal Commissions addressed different issues.

hindi.explanation: सरकारिया आयोग ने यह सिफारिश की थी कि राज्यपाल की नियुक्ति निष्पक्ष होनी चाहिए।

questions.original_question: The Ennum Ezhuthum scheme was launched by the Tamil Nadu government to ensure foundational Literacy and Numeracy by 2025. This scheme was launched to bridge the learning gap among students aged ________.

english.explanation: The Ennum Ezhuthum scheme targets children aged 6-10 years to address foundational literacy and numeracy gaps. This aligns with primary school eligibility for foundational education.

hindi.explanation: एन्नम एज़ुथुम योजना 2025 तक मूलभूत साक्षरता और संख्यात्मकता सुनिश्चित करने के लिए तमिलनाडु सरकार द्वारा 6 से 10 वर्ष आयु वर्ग के छात्रों के साथ शुरू की गई थी।

questions.original_question: Which act allows the government to confiscate the assets of newspaper in case of publishing anything &ldquo;objectionable&rdquo;?

english.explanation: The Vernacular Press Act of 1878 allowed the British government to confiscate assets of Indian newspapers for publishing 'objectionable' content. The Ilbert Act (1883) allowed British judges to preside in cases involving British subjects, while the other options are fictional.

hindi.explanation: वर्नाक्युलर प्रेस एक्ट, 1878 आपत्तिजनक चीजों के प्रकाशन में समाचार पत्र की संपत्ति को जब्त करने की अनुमति देता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a festival of merriment and heralds the Assamese New Year and the onset of spring?

english.explanation: Bohag Bihu is the Assamese New Year festival, celebrated in April to mark the onset of spring. Other options like Ali-ai-ligang (Mizoram) and Kati Bihu (harvest festival) are distinct Assamese/Mizo festivals.

hindi.explanation: बोहाग बिहू आनंद का त्यौहार है और असमिया नव वर्ष और वसंत की शुरुआत का अग्रदूत है।

questions.original_question: The lava plateaus are rich in which kind of soil?

english.explanation: Lava plateaus, such as the Deccan Plateau, are rich in black soil (regur soil), formed from volcanic activity. Laterite soil forms in hot, wet regions, while alluvial and red soils are associated with river valleys and old crystalline rocks, respectively.

hindi.explanation: लावा पठार काली मिट्टी से समृद्ध हैं। काली मिट्टी फलों के लिए बहुत अच्छी होती है।

questions.original_question: The T-20 Cricket World Cup for women was held in which country in 2020?

english.explanation: The 2020 Women's T20 Cricket World Cup was hosted by the West Indies. Australia hosted the 2020 men's T20 World Cup, while the UK hosted the 2020 women's event incorrectly attributed to the West Indies in some sources. However, the West Indies is the correct answer here.

hindi.explanation: महिलाओं के लिए टी-20 क्रिकेट विश्व कप 2020 ऑस्ट्रेलिया में आयोजित किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is known as ammonia?

english.explanation: Ammonia is chemically represented as NH3. PH3 is phosphine, NO3 is nitrate, and NO2 is nitrogen dioxide. NH3 is a common base in industrial and household applications.

hindi.explanation: NH3 को अमोनिया के रूप में जाना जाता है।

questions.original_question: Ashoka appointed ______ to solve the social problems in his region.

english.explanation: Ashoka appointed Dhamma Mahamattas (commissioners) to promote dharma (moral and social welfare) and resolve social issues. Samaharta collected revenues, nyayadheesh administered justice, and amatya served as ministers.

hindi.explanation: अशोक ने अपने क्षेत्र की सामाजिक समस्याओं के समाधान के लिए समाहर्ता के नियुक्त किया।

english.explanation: Add the number of officers in all companies: 400 (D) + 500 (E) + 600 (F) + 350 (G) + 450 (H) + 800 (I) = 3100. The total is 3100.

questions.original_question: If cos (A &ndash; B) =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{\sqrt 3 }}{2}\)</span>, and cos (A + B) = 0, where A and B are positive acute angles and A&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\( \ge \)</span>&nbsp;B, then the measures of A and B are:

english.explanation: Given cos(A–B)=√3/2 (60°) and cos(A+B)=0 (90°). Solving A–B=60° and A+B=90° gives A=60°, B=30°.

hindi.explanation: हमें दिया गया है कि cos(A - B) = √3/2 और cos(A + B) = 0। पहले समीकरण से, A - B = 30° (क्योंकि cos(30°) = √3/2), और दूसरे समीकरण से, A + B = 90° (क्योंकि cos(90°) = 0)। इन दोनों समीकरणों को हल करने पर: A = 60° और B = 30° प्राप्त होता है। ये मान दिए गए सभी शर्तों (A ≥ B, न्यून कोण होना) को संतुष्ट करते हैं।
key_concepts: समीकरण का योग और अंतर ज्ञात करना
न्यून कोणों की परिभाषा (0° से 90° के बीच)

questions.original_question: A person travels in a car at 40 km/h for 3 hours, on a bike at 30 km/h for 2 hours, and in a train at 80 km/h for 5 hours. What is the average speed at which he travelled?

english.explanation: Total distance: (40*3)+(30*2)+(80*5)=580 km. Total time: 10 h. Average speed=580/10=58 km/h.

hindi.explanation: औसत गति ज्ञात करने के लिए, हमें कुल यात्रा की गई दूरी को कुल लिया गया समय से विभाजित करना होगा। कार द्वारा तय की गई दूरी = 40 किमी/घंटा × 3 घंटे = 120 किमी। स्कूटर पर तय की गई दूरी = 30 किमी/घंटा × 2 घंटे = 60 किमी। ट्रेन द्वारा तय की गई दूरी = 80 किमी/घंटा × 5 घंटे = 400 किमी। कुल दूरी = 120 + 60 + 400 = 580 किमी। कुल समय = 3 + 2 + 5 = 10 घंटे। औसत गति = 580 किमी ÷ 10 घंटे = 58 किमी/घंटा।
key_concepts: औसत गति = कुल दूरी / कुल समय
विभिन्न गति वाले यात्राओं के लिए दूरी ज्ञात करना
समय और गति के माध्यम से दूरी की गणना

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{\rm X}^2} + \frac{1}{{{{\rm X}^2}}} = 66\)</span>&nbsp;, the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({\rm X} - \frac{1}{{\rm X}}\)</span>&nbsp;is_______.

english.explanation: Use identity: (X–1/X)² = X² + 1/X² - 2. Given X² +1/X²=66, so (X–1/X)²=66-2=64 → X–1/X=8.

questions.original_question: If tan A =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{2}{3}\)</span> , then find sinA.

english.explanation: tan A=2/3. Opposite=2, adjacent=3, hypotenuse=√13. So sin A=opposite/hypotenuse=2/√13.

hindi.explanation: हम जानते हैं कि tan A = लम्बी / आधार = 2/3 है। एक समकोण त्रिभुज मानकर, लम्बी 2 इकाई और आधार 3 इकाई होगा। हमें sin A = लम्बी / कर्ण निकालना है। कर्ण की गणना पाइथागोरस प्रमेय द्वारा करेंगे: कर्ण = √(2² + 3²) = √13। अतः sin A = 2/√13 होगा।
key_concepts: tan और sin के बीच संबंध

questions.original_question: 20 men can finish a work in 220 days, but at the end of 90 days, 20 additional men are employed. In how many more days will the work be completed?

english.explanation: Total work=20*220=4400. After 90 days: 20*90=1800. Remaining=2600. With 40 men: 2600/40=65 days.

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{\sin \theta + \cos \theta }}{{\sin \theta - \cos \theta }} = \frac{3}{2}\)</span>, then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({\sin ^4}\theta - {\cos ^4}\theta \)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: Cross-multiplying gives 2(sinθ+cosθ)=3(sinθ–cosθ) → sinθ=5cosθ. Using sin´θ–cos´θ=(sin²θ+cos²θ)(sin²θ–cos²θ)=12/13.

questions.original_question: The length of the side of a cube is 2.8 cm. What is the volume of the largest sphere that can be taken out of the cube?

english.explanation: Largest sphere diameter=2.8 cm (cube side). Radius=1.4 cm. Volume=(4/3)π(1.4)³≈11.55 cm³.

hindi.explanation: एक घन की भुजा की लंबाई 2.8 सेमी है। सबसे बड़े गोले का व्यास घन की भुजा के बराबर होगा, इसलिए त्रिज्या (r) = 2.8 ÷ 2 = 1.4 सेमी। गोले का आयतन सूत्र (4/3)πr³ के द्वारा ज्ञात किया गया। गणना करने पर: (4/3) × (22/7) × (1.4)³ = 11.55 सेमी³।
key_concepts: घन और गोले के बीच संबंध (व्यास = घन की भुजा)
संख्यात्मक गणना में π के मान का उपयोग (22/7 या 3.14)

questions.original_question: In a circle of radius 3 cm, two chords of length 2 cm and 3 cm lie on the different side of a diameter. What is the perpendicular distance between the two chords?

english.explanation: For 2 cm chord: distance from center=√(9–1)=2√2. For 3 cm chord: √(9–2.25)=3√3/2. Total distance=2√2+3√3/2= (4√2+3√3)/2.

key_concepts: जीवा के केंद्र से दूरी का सूत्र: h = √(r² - (l/2)²)
जीवाएँ विपरीत ओर होने पर दूरी के योग की गणना

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(k + \frac{1}{k} = 4\)</span>&nbsp;, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({k^4} + \frac{1}{{{k^4}}}\)</span>&nbsp;?

english.explanation: Given k+1/k=4. Square: k²+1/k²=14. Square again: k´+1/k´=194.
State B: 1.40 lakh students. Passing ratio=3:4. Passing= (3/7)*1.40=0.6 lakh.

hindi.explanation: राज्य B में छात्रों की कुल संख्या 1.40 लाख है। उत्तीर्ण और अनुत्तीर्ण छात्रों का अनुपात 3:4 है। कुल भाग = 3 + 4 = 7। अतः उत्तीर्ण छात्रों की संख्या = (3/7) × 1.40 = 0.6 लाख।
key_concepts: कुल मात्रा से भाग का प्रयोग

english.explanation: Assuming pie chart shows percentages for P and S, the difference corresponds to 13.2% of 1620=211.2 crores.

hindi.explanation: वृत्त आलेख में राज्य P और S के कोणीय मान के अंतर का पता लगाया जाता है। यदि राज्य S का कोणीय मान 80 डिग्री और राज्य P का कोणीय मान 33.2 डिग्री है, तो अंतर 46.8 डिग्री होगा। इस अंतर के आधार पर व्यय की गणना करने पर: (46.8/360) × 1620 = 210.6 करोड़ रुपये होगा।
key_concepts: वृत्त आलेख के कोणों की गणना
कुल व्यय से अंश के आधार पर व्यय की गणना

questions.original_question: The LCM of 144, 360 and 450 is:

A shopkeeper offers a cash discount of Rs. 85 first and then two successive discounts of 10% and 2% on the marked price of a fan. If the marked price of the fan is Rs. 1,285, what is its selling price (in Rs )?

english.explanation: Cash discount: 1285–85=1200. Then 10% of 1200=120, remaining=1080. 2% of 1080=21.6 → Final SP=1058.4.

key_concepts: छूट की गणना करते समय पहले नकद छूट अंकित मूल्य से घटाई जाती है।
क्रमागत छूट पिछली छूट के बाद बचे हुए मूल्य पर लगाई जाती है।
प्रतिशत छूट की गणना मूल्य के एक निश्चित प्रतिशत को घटाकर की जाती है।

questions.original_question: Sofia sold an iPhone at the cost of Rs.46,068 at a loss of 12%. At what cost will she have to sell it to get a profit of 18%?

hindi.explanation: सोफिया द्वारा आईफोन का बिक्री मूल्य 46,068 रुपये है जिसमें 12% की हानि हुई है। सबसे पहले क्रय मूल्य (CP) की गणना करते हैं। हानि के दशमलव में मान = 12% = 0.12। बिक्री मूल्य = क्रय मूल्य × (1 - 0.12) => 46,068 = CP × 0.88 => CP = 46,068 / 0.88 = 52,350 रुपये। अब 18% लाभ प्राप्त करने के लिए बिक्री मूल्य = क्रय मूल्य × (1 + 0.18) = 52,350 × 1.18 = 61,773 रुपये। इसलिए सही उत्तर पहला है।
key_concepts: हानि के मूल्य से क्रय मूल्य निकालना: बिक्री मूल्य = क्रय मूल्य × (1 - हानि%)
लाभ प्राप्त करने वाला बिक्री मूल्य: बिक्री मूल्य = क्रय मूल्य × (1 + लाभ%)
दशमलव गणना का उपयोग प्रतिशत के रूप में बदलने के लिए।

questions.original_question: If the number 123456789 is divided by 9, then the remainder is:

english.explanation: To find the remainder when 123456789 is divided by 9, sum the digits: 1+2+3+4+5+6+7+8+9 = 45. Since 45 is divisible by 9 (45 ÷ 9 = 5), the remainder is 0.

hindi.explanation: संख्या 123456789 को 9 से विभाजित करने पर शेषफल की गणना करने के लिए, हम जानते हैं कि कोई संख्या 9 से पूरी तरह विभाजित होती है यदि इसके अंकों का योग 9 से विभाजित होता है। अंकों का योग 1+2+3+4+5+6+7+8+9 = 45 है, जो 9 से पूरी तरह विभाजित है। अतः शेषफल 0 है।

questions.original_question: Menu and Daya travel from point A to B, a distance of 105 km, at speeds of 10 km/h and 25 km/h, respectively. Daya reaches point B first and returns immediately and meets Menu at point C. Find the distance from point A to point C.

english.explanation: Let the distance from A to C be x km. Menu travels x km at 10 km/h, taking x/10 hours. Daya travels 105 km to B (taking 105/25 = 4.2 hours) and returns. When they meet, Daya has traveled 105 km to B and (x/10 - 4.2) hours returning at 25 km/h. The distance Daya covers returning is 25*(x/10 - 4.2). The equation becomes x = 105 - 25*(x/10 - 4.2). Solving gives x = 60 km.

hindi.explanation: मीनू की गति 10 किमी/घंटा और दया की 25 किमी/घंटा है। दया पहले बिंदु B पर पहुँचती है जिसमें उसे 105/25 = 4.2 घंटे लगते हैं। इस समय में मीनू 10×4.2 = 42 किमी चलती है। दया लौटते समय मीनू से मिलती है। सापेक्ष गति 25+10 = 35 किमी/घंटा है। बिंदु B से बिंदु C तक की दूरी (105-42) = 63 किमी है। मुलाकात के समय 63/35 = 1.8 घंटे है। मीनू द्वारा अतिरिक्त दूरी 10×1.8 = 18 किमी है। अतः बिंदु C की दूरी A से 42+18 = 60 किमी है।

questions.original_question: If 36 : 81 :: X : 63, what is the value of X?

english.explanation: The proportion 36 : 81 :: X : 63 simplifies to 36/81 = X/63. Simplify 36/81 to 4/9. Solving 4/9 = X/63 gives X = (4*63)/9 = 28.

hindi.explanation: माना 36:81 = X:63। अनुपात को समान रखने पर 36/81 = X/63। सरलीकरण करने पर 4/9 = X/63, जिससे X = (4×63)/9 = 28 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Triangle ABC and DEF are similar. If AB = 92 cm, BC = 48 cm, AC =120 cm, and the length of the smallest side of DEF is 200 cm, then find the length of the longest side of triangle DEF?

english.explanation: In similar triangles, the ratio of sides is preserved. The smallest side of ABC is 48 cm, and the smallest side of DEF is 200 cm. The ratio is 200/48 = 25/6. The longest side of ABC is 120 cm. Multiply by the ratio: 120*(25/6) = 500 cm.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज ABC और DEF समरूप हैं। ABC की भुजाएँ 48 सेमी, 92 सेमी, 120 सेमी हैं। सबसे छोटी भुजा BC (48 सेमी) DEF में 200 सेमी है। समरूप त्रिभुजों के अनुपात से, 48/200 = 120/X (क्योंकि AC सबसे लंबी भुजा है)। X = (120×200)/48 = 500 सेमी प्राप्त होता है।
key_concepts: भुजाओं के अनुपात के आधार पर माप

questions.original_question: In an election contested between two candidates, 15% of the total voters did not cast their votes and 100 votes got disqualified. The candidate who won the election won by securing 45% of the total votes and won by a margin of 400 votes. Find the total number of voters.

english.explanation: Let total voters be V. Valid votes = 0.85V - 100. The winner got 45% of total votes (0.45V). Winner’s votes - Loser’s votes = 0.45V - [(0.85V - 100) - 0.45V] = 0.05V + 100 = 400. Solving gives V = 6000.

key_concepts: समीकरण से अज्ञात मान ज्ञात करना

english.explanation: The angle for education in a pie chart is calculated as (percentage of expenditure) * 360°. If the education sector is 15%, the angle is 0.15 * 360° = 54°.

hindi.explanation: वृत्त आलेख में शिक्षा के त्रिज्यखण्ड द्वारा बनाया गया कोण ज्ञात करने के लिए, हमें प्रतिशत या मान की आवश्यकता होती है। यदि शिक्षा 15% व्यय पर है, तो कोण = (15/100) × 360 = 54° होगा।

questions.original_question: Two angles of a triangle are equal and the third angle measures 78&deg;. What is the measure of each of the unknown angles?

english.explanation: The sum of angles in a triangle is 180°. Let the two equal angles be x. Then x + x + 78° = 180°. Solving gives 2x = 102°, so x = 51°.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज के कोणों का योग 180° होता है। दो कोण बराबर हैं, तीसरा 78° है। माना अज्ञात कोण x हैं। x + x + 78 = 180। 2x = 102, x = 51° प्राप्त होता है।
key_concepts: समीकरण से अज्ञात मान ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: What is the present value of Rs.10,000 received in 2 years, if the interest rate is 12% per year, compounded semi-annually?

english.explanation: Using present value formula: PV = FV / (1 + r/n)^(nt). Here, FV = 10,000, r = 12% (0.12), n = 2 (semi-annual), t = 2. PV = 10000 / (1 + 0.12/2)^(4) ≈ 7920.94.

questions.original_question: A conical vessel (solid) is made of iron. Its base radius is 7 cm and height is 15 cm. If the weight of the iron per cubic centimetre is 15 g, what is the weight of the vessel?

english.explanation: Volume of cone = (1/3)πr²h = (1/3)*π*7²*15 ≈ 769.3 cm³. Weight = 769.3 * 15 g = 11539.5 g ≈ 11.54 kg (rounded to 11.55 kg).

questions.original_question: If p + q = 6 and pq = 4, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(3\left( {{p^3} + {q^3}} \right)\)</span>?

english.explanation: Using identity p³ + q³ = (p + q)³ - 3pq(p + q). Substitute p + q = 6 and pq = 4: p³ + q³ = 6³ - 3*4*6 = 216 - 72 = 144. Multiply by 3: 3*144 = 432.

hindi.explanation: p + q = 6 और pq = 4। p³ + q³ के मान के लिए सूत्र (p + q)³ - 3pq(p + q) का उपयोग करते हैं: 6³ - 3×4×6 = 216 - 72 = 144। 3×144 = 432 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Try to be <u>frugal</u> with your hard-earned money.</p>

english.explanation: The word 'frugal' means being careful with money or resources. 'Economical' is the correct synonym as it also refers to using resources efficiently. 'Imprudent' is the opposite, 'negligent' refers to carelessness, and 'honest' is unrelated.

The correct order starts with B (introducing the event), followed by A (its significance), then C (description of the event), and D (additional details about the schools). This sequence ensures logical flow and coherence.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Laproscopy' is incorrectly spelled. The correct spelling is 'Laparoscopy,' referring to a medical procedure. The other words are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>A book market / was been operated by some readers / in the street when / they reached there.</p>

options.value: was been operated by some readers

english.correct_answer: 3. was been operated by some readers
english.explanation: The segment 'was been operated' is grammatically incorrect. The correct form should be 'was being operated' to indicate a continuous past action. The other parts of the sentence are grammatically correct.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate collocating word to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>The girl has ________ chances of winning the match.</p>

english.explanation: 'High chances' is the correct collocation for the sentence. 'Bountiful' and 'hefty' are less common in this context, while 'light' contradicts the intended meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>No one was prepared for the environmental <u>calamity</u>&nbsp;that hit the town in the middle of the night.</p>

english.explanation: 'Calamity' and 'catastrophe' both refer to a sudden, disastrous event. 'Damage' is a result, 'degradation' relates to deterioration, and 'stress' is unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Something which is worth believing</p>

english.explanation: 'Credible' directly means something that is believable. 'Spurious' is false, 'expedient' is convenient, and 'impending' refers to something approaching.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>Somebody is following us.</p>

options.value: We have been following by somebody.

english.explanation: The passive voice of 'Somebody is following us' is correctly formed as 'We’re being followed by somebody.' Options 1 and 2 are tense errors, and option 3 has incorrect subject-verb agreement.
The logical sequence starts with R (introducing Köppen), followed by S (classification), Q (map description), and P (division based on temperature). This order builds from general to specific.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Fair-weather friends</p>

options.value: A person who is friends with you during the night
A person who is friends with you every day
A person whose friendship cannot be relied on in times
A person who is friends with you in difficult times

english.correct_answer: 3. A person whose friendship cannot be relied on in times
english.explanation: 'Fair-weather friends' refers to people who support only in good times. Options 1 and 2 are incorrect, while option 4 is the opposite.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>The child broke many toys in the shop. He even threw the paintings.</p>

options.value: Many toys in the shop have been broken by the child. Even the paintings were thrown by him.
Many toys in the shop were broken by the child. Even the paintings have been thrown by him.
Many toys in the shop were broken by the child. Even the paintings were thrown by him.
Many toys in the shop were broken by the child. He has even thrown the paintings.

english.correct_answer: 3. Many toys in the shop were broken by the child. Even the paintings were thrown by him.
english.explanation: The passive voice requires past perfect for 'broken' and past tense for 'thrown' to match the original sentence. Other options have tense or voice errors.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the sentence that uses the idiom correctly.</strong>

options.value: Ranita was not selected for the job as she got cold feet.
Walking bare feet on grass gave him cold feet.
After too much cycling Arun got cold feet.
One can swim easily with cold feet.

english.correct_answer: 1. Ranita was not selected for the job as she got cold feet.
english.explanation: 'Cold feet' refers to losing confidence or courage. Option 1 correctly uses the idiom to explain Ranita's job rejection.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct direct form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The doctor said that they had performed their bit.</p>

options.value: The doctor said, &ldquo;We will be performing our bit.&quot;
The doctor said, &ldquo;We are performing our bit.&quot;
The doctor said, &ldquo;We have performed our bit.&quot;
The doctor says, &ldquo;We had performed our bit.&quot;

english.correct_answer: 3. The doctor said, "We have performed our bit."
english.explanation: The direct speech must match the past perfect tense in the reported speech. 'Have performed' is the correct present perfect in direct form.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Demolish</p>

english.explanation: 'Demolish' means to destroy completely. 'Ruin' is the closest synonym. 'Create,' 'Fabricate,' and 'Shape' are opposites.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Abundant</p>

english.explanation: 'Minimal' is the antonym of 'abundant,' meaning very little. 'Aplenty' and 'Plentiful' are synonyms, while 'Fertile' is unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>Children listens to people / speaking around them / for a long time before / they begin to speak.</p>

english.explanation: The subject 'Children' is plural, so the verb should be 'listen' instead of 'listens'. The incorrect singular verb in segment 1 creates a subject-verb agreement error.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न अप्रत्यक्ष रूप से देखा गया है। प्रश्न या विकल्प उपलब्ध न होने के कारण उत्तर ज्ञात नहीं हो सका। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न प्रदान करें।

english.explanation: The correct sequence is: 'The issue of compulsory vaccination is difficult because the governments need to consider multiple interests all protected by human rights law and strike a fair balance between them.' The order PRQS connects the issue (P), reason (R), interests (Q), and resolution (S) logically.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न अप्रत्यक्ष रूप से देखा गया है। प्रश्न या विकल्प उपलब्ध न होने के कारण उत्तर ज्ञात नहीं हो सका। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न प्रदान करें।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct spelling of the underlined word from the following options.</strong></p>

<p>Handover that <u>peace</u> of paper to me so that I can evaluate the authenticity of his amorous claims.</p>

english.explanation: 'Piece' is the correct spelling for 'a part of something' (e.g., a piece of paper). The other options (peice, peices, pieces) are misspellings except for 'pieces,' which is plural but not required here.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न अप्रत्यक्ष रूप से देखा गया है। प्रश्न या विकल्प उपलब्ध न होने के कारण उत्तर ज्ञात नहीं हो सका। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न प्रदान करें।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>The crowing witch released a _________cackle as she turned the boy into a beast.</p>

english.explanation: A 'cackle' is typically a loud, harsh sound. 'Loud' fits the context of a witch's menacing action. 'Gentle,' 'low,' and 'soft' contradict the intensity implied by 'cackle.'

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न अप्रत्यक्ष रूप से देखा गया है। प्रश्न या विकल्प उपलब्ध न होने के कारण उत्तर ज्ञात नहीं हो सका। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न प्रदान करें।
